metadata.title: CVE-2019-19555 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description:
read_textobject in read.c in Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7b has a stack-based buffer overflow because of an incorrect sscanf.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-19555` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.7b-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.7b-3ubuntu1').
